description: landscape with man and dog walking on cart path in foreground, with trees and ruined fences on either side of path; two silhouetted figures on path in middle ground; rather small castle on top of rugged mountain in background
marks:

on back, in pencil: [(illegible) O
title: Ruins of a Castle on a Steep Hill (Die Burgruine auf dem schroffen Felsen)
